You can see license on a link given below. Apache license Thank you Inderjeet Singh for designing the app icon ca-app-pub-3876828674787345/6034922915 donate_coffee donate_beer donate_beer_box 0 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bhandari.music If you like the app, please take a time to leave a review on store as it encourages me more to deliver more stuff! Touch the album art to change You have made changes in some tags, do you want to save those? How often have you ruined the song because of wrong touch! Imagine you are enoying the best part of the song while going through library and by mistake you click on some song and baaam, your mood is ruined. This button is here for rescue. Whenever you want to enjoy a song without interruption and browse gallery meanwhile, just lock the music by using this button and player will not change song unless and until you unlock it again! All the changes done in music tag are local to device. Actual audio file is not modified! albumArtThumbsABMusic Lyrics not found, Touch here to retry! Lyrics coming soon! Unable to fetch artist bio, Please make sure audio is correctly tagged! \n Touch here to retry! Loading lyrics, please wait… No connection! Touch here to retry! Loading artist bio, please wait…! Unable to search artist bio, make sure that audio tags are correct and touch here to retry! Please make sure audio tags are correct! Please make sure audio tags are correct! Update Double tap here to see artist bio! Try music lock feature Tap the button to lock the music! Smooth music control from here! Tap to launch now playing! Try sorting your music on the go! Tap the sort music! Add track to fav Tap here to add track to My Fav Playlist!" Current Queue! Tap to manage current queue! Swipe right! Try swiping right here to see artist info!
